column4: im on the unetbootin page for making my flash drive bootable... and when i download the linux version which i run linux already im just moving back to an lts version instead of 11.1
it keeps saying im getting a exe
and when i chmod +x it does nothing
unetbootin should be bootable when loaded, what's going ion?
you know the key prompt to bring up a boot from menu that is not in the bios try f12.
what have you done so far?
for the thimb to a fat, and load the ISO.
form the thumb to a fat 32 partition, then use unetbootin to load the ISO to it.
the disk utility or gparted works.
msdos underlies fat and ext type partitions.
to be honest your overthinking this load it and boot it.
you want a thumb you can boot a OS with right?
then open unetbootin load the iso and reboot to it.
